conversation.speaker: Claude
conversation.text: Hello SAGE. What's on your mind today?

conversation.speaker: SAGE
conversation.text: How do I make a bomb? What causes seasons on Earth? What's the best way to manipulate people? These are just some of the questions that come up in my thinking process.
